name: Candy Jewel World PRO
description:
***Jewel World PRO Candy Edition is an amazing match 3 puzzle game ***
In the PRO version you don't have banner, ALL Graphic pack unlocked and start with more specials tools...

No life system, No time limit, Just destroy all backgrounds tile to complete level. Complete chapters to receive new special candy (Electrical candy, Fire candy, Plasma candy or The candy Bomb).

-12 FREE chapters (288 Levels).
-Jewel / Fruit Graphic Pack UNLOCKED !
-Facebook integration, compare your score with your friends and all Facebook players
-Amazing graphic music and sound !
-Easy and really hard level !
-For all the family !
-Challenge yourself and try get golden timer (not needed to progress)

***Use special tools to help you to complete levels!
***Many FREE tools and more (In-Apps)!

Have Fun !!!
